rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.vastu_notes: Place near main entrance, positive energy

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.vastu_notes: North or East wall for good luck and prosperity

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.vastu_notes: Should face the main door to ensure privacy, consider South or West walls

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.vastu_notes: East facing is recommended for auspiciousness and fire element balance

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.vastu_notes: Central location, preferably south or east to invite positive energies

rooms.name: Study/Workspace
rooms.vastu_notes: North is preferred for intellectual activity and clarity

openings.vastu_notes: Proper window size to ensure natural light

rooms.name: Guest Room 2
rooms.vastu_notes: North or East wall for prosperity

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.vastu_notes: Consider placing near main staircase, preferably facing East or North

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.vastu_notes: Ensure proper ventilation and east-west alignment for water flow

openings.vastu_notes: Good for relaxation, ensure unobstructed view of natural elements
Ensure ample daylight and energy flow
